description: This fantasy roleplay shoot is an ode to sexploitation, women in prison, revenge plot movies. Ariel X gets popped for roughing up an innocent bartender while her accomplice Princess Donna Dolore leaves her high and dry. She's placed in a women's correctional facility and subjected to heavy lesbian punishment by warden Maitresse Madeline. Bondage in chains, singletail, spanking, foot worship, ass licking, nipple torture, strap-on fucking, anal sex and humiliation are all included. When Maitresse Madeline brings in a new psychiatrist who has unconventional ways of rehabilitating the female prisoners she is more than meets the eye and the plot thickens!
title: Lesbian Revenge
